title: How the priv-apps (LLKAgent, ConnMO, DiagMon, and os on) are build to the product partition?
content: I have got to know how to build the android-img from AOSP, but I need to add my app to the product-partition together with priv-apps that are already there: (AppDirectedSMSService, DiagMon, ConnMO, etc.). I cannot find how this apps are build into the product partition.
